scripts.predev: npm install --dev && cd login && npm install --dev && cd ../ && cd storage && npm install --dev && cd ../ && cd dashboard && npm install --dev && cd ../
scripts.dev: mkdir dist && mkdir dist\child && cd login && npm run dev && cd ../storage && npm run dev &&cd ../dashboard && npm run dev
scripts.serve: echo "In order to better watch the compiler's output, you should run 'npm run serve' in each micro application."
scripts.prebuild: cd login && npm install && cd ../ && cd storage && npm install && cd ../ && cd dashboard && npm install
scripts.build: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/child && cd login && npm run build && cd ../storage && npm run build && cd ../dashboard && npm run build
